usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Swap a Face Online
usage.description: Create stunning images in just a few simple steps:

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Simply click 'Upload an Image' and select a photo you want to use as the source image. Ensure only one face in the photo is of good quality.

items.title: Choose your Face Swap Option
items.description: Once your original image is ready, choose the desired swapping effect from the given presets. That means you will replace the face of your uploaded image with the selected preset.

items.title: Swap Face with AI
items.description: Click the 'Swap Face Now' button to show AI its magic. AiFaceSwap.app will finish face swapping in a few seconds. Our AI does the job automatically while guaranteeing the best output.

items.title: Preview and Download
items.description: Bingo! Your face is swapped to who you like! Preview the final result on the same page. Click 'Download' to save the watermark-free picture to your device. Share it for fun!

items.title: How does AI Face Swap work?
items.description: Our advanced AI technology analyzes facial features in both images, then seamlessly swaps them while maintaining natural looks and expressions. The process takes just seconds and ensures high-quality results.

items.title: Is my data secure?
items.description: Yes, absolutely! We take privacy very seriously. All uploaded photos are processed securely and automatically deleted after processing. We never store or share your images without permission.

items.title: What image formats are supported?
items.description: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. For best results, we recommend using clear, well-lit photos with visible faces.

items.title: Can I swap multiple faces in one image?
items.description: Yes! Our Pro and Enterprise plans support multiple face swaps in a single image. You can swap different faces with different source images in one go.

items.title: Do you offer an API?
items.description: Yes, we provide a robust API for developers to integrate our face swap technology into their applications. API access is available with our Pro and Enterprise plans.

items.title: What's your refund policy?
items.description: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with our service, contact us within 7 days of your purchase for a full refund.
